website_summaries.verdict: This fishy and smooth broth works just as well as a lickable treat or food topper.
pros: Fish broth, skipjack tuna, and scallops are the first three ingredients
Comes in a set of 10 trays
cons: A little on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: Appetizers are back!!!!!  Hallelujah.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Fancy Feast for bringing back the Appetizers! My two cats loved these things until Fancy Feast discontinued and replaced with the "Purely" kind. They wouldn't touch those with a ten foot pole, and I've been looking for a replacement ever since. Kitties are happy campers once again, and so is Mom!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Helps our elderly cat keep her weight up!
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these appetizers for our skinny, elderly cat for about 2 years now. This is by far her preferred flavor. She doesn't generally like wet food so we've relied on these to keep her moisture consumption up. I think the broth might be her favorite part of the dish. These are not cheap, but we are glad to be able to spoil her in her old age.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh, well
customer_reviews.text: Her High Exulted Majesty was interested only in the juice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast Appetizers Adult Wet Cat Food Complement
customer_reviews.text: Very small amount of an just OK product for a lot of money! Not a good value. My cats were not impressed, as I had hoped they would be, by this cat food. Disappointing. Also the tiny plastic containers are hard to clean to recycle, which I like to do. Had the cats really ticked-in and enjoyed this cat food, it would be worth the money. But they liked the less expensive canned stuff better. The fish was very dark and the cats did not go for it at all. Bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack! LOL
customer_reviews.text: If you have a picky cat, get this. This saved my cats life. She was on her way to a feeding tube, she snubbed her nose up to everything but....ate this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. It is less expensive to buy it here than at walmart. Will definetly buy it here again. And I feel like it is healthy good food, there are chunks of tuna or chicken depending what kind you get.
customer_reviews.author: Habuse

customer_reviews.title: One of my kitty's favorites
customer_reviews.text: She is not a finicky eater but she does have a range of responses to different toppers. The serving (about 1 tblsp) on top of dry food is eaten in one setting. She licks the plate clean. Other toppers are sampled over a period of a couple of hours. Am hoping it's the quality of the product that makes her love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randon

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast appetizers
customer_reviews.text: I use this to give cats l-lysine and liquid medicine. It works great for that as it’s not too much to eat so I know they got the medicine. They like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: PKSreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cat adores it!
customer_reviews.text: My Cat LOVES this product, it is his favorite flavor and the only wet food he eats quickly and completely! It always gets here quickly to refill his bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley heartfield

customer_reviews.title: super small scallop- buy from pets store
customer_reviews.text: This treat suppose to have a scallop topper. The same treat from pets store has a scallop a bit smaller then a quarter. This treat scallops were smaller then a dime. It is my cats favorite part of treat and i feel she got ripped off. Better to buy from pets store.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Addicting Appetizer
customer_reviews.text: My cat is in love with this Fancy Feast Appetizers. As soon as I put down her dish, she ate the food as quickly as she could possibly eat it. The price is definitely quite a value a sc well.
customer_reviews.author: iroth

customer_reviews.title: A bust for me
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for presentation but not like picture. Also my 🐈 didn't like it a lot. Seriously a big disappointment. Can't account for taste. In human 😁
customer_reviews.author: audra

customer_reviews.title: My cats say YES
customer_reviews.text: My finicky cats love these. No more throwing away food they won't eat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Thanks alot Jen
customer_reviews.text: My coworker got me to get these for my cat... my cat goes crazy over these!! They are actually kind of cute with the scallop on top... cat eats better than me sometimes lol
customer_reviews.author: Thae

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this and only this
customer_reviews.text: Thats the only wet food my cat eats, I tried everything! He only eats dry food and this l!
customer_reviews.author: Julian T.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it...
customer_reviews.text: My cats are finicky just like everyone else's cats. This may not be the thing for your cats, but my cats love these. A little pricey, but in my opinion worth it. Very convenient single serving sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Daunte

customer_reviews.title: 5 Cat Meows....
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. 1st time purchasing it and they liked it so I loved it. So happy, went back in & subscribed. A keeper. Quality, tasty & affordable. A+
customer_reviews.author: Ida Grant

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My Cat just Loves the taste of this Entrée. I serve it to her as a Reward.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mullett

customer_reviews.title: Sam loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food & flavor of food that my cat will actually eat & clean his bowl!! Nice to know I can find it online because it’s very hard next to impossible to locate in stores. This particular kind is very scarce for some reason 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte W.

customer_reviews.title: Liking it
customer_reviews.text: The kitties seem to like it. It is neat that a scallop is in the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Ammy

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old fur baby loves these, it has boosted his energy and he seems to be feeling better since adding this to his diet each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loved & Approved
customer_reviews.text: My Cat loves this food & comes running for it every time I open the tray! It’s his favorite treat of the day. I just wish there was a little more in each tray to make it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Little Angel

customer_reviews.title: Apparently Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My cat went crazy for this stuff and it smelled like human grade tuna
customer_reviews.author: THudson

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to what I thought, not all cats like fish!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good. Unfortunately, it seems that my cats don't like fish.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Klekner

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but tasty.
customer_reviews.text: The fur balls really like this. Consider it a special treat because of price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a huge fave
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old cat LOVES these. They're all she wants now, though, and they are, after all, treats, and priced accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these, but they are a little expensive. Easy to open and containers are easy to recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: What a treat!
customer_reviews.text: Great special food treat for my cats. It is a bit $$$$, but so a special treat it is perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Marie-elena Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Elderly cat only wants to eat this food now. Best price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon - an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the fussy cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat will eat this without having to doctor it up
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE B

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves having this is his nightly snack. Not happy that this new packaging has half the weight but the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. I was having a hard time getting her to eat soft food and she’ll eat this. Finicky cat😊. Anyway, I feed her this along with her other food.
customer_reviews.author: Alice W. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price!! My cat absolutely loves this cat food. Also, the price on amazon compared to other retailers is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Kopp

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's New Favorite Food
customer_reviews.text: My Cat gives this 5 stars. Loves the flavor and Nice sauce. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that my finicky cat wants this twice a day so it must be good!
customer_reviews.author: J. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Cats go crazy for this.
customer_reviews.text: Our kitties love this food. When we feed them this as a treat or snack as soon as we open the container they go crazy for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann A

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is very picky, but she loves this appetizer in particular. I was unsure wether she’d eat the scallop topper, but it appeared to be her favorite part, as she’d eat it first every time. I recommend getting for your furry friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll probably have to get them again
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tasted them with the kids seem to love them
customer_reviews.author: JOE D.

customer_reviews.title: My girl just got dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Seems my cat liked at first, but slowly turned her nose up at it. Smelled good to me, like yum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not feed as a food... only as,a treat or food topper.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them, but gets them as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Rod

customer_reviews.title: taste
customer_reviews.text: She eats all that is served her, she loves it. We had problems with her eating she would only lick the gravy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasty snack for your cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this as a daily snack. Great find did a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Duy Han

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. Hard to find in our local stores.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Wet Cat Food Complement, Appetizers Light Meat Tuna With a Scallop Topper - (10) 1.1 oz. Trays
product_meta.description: Speak to your cat's sophisticated tastes when you offer her Purina Fancy Feast Appetizers Light Meat Tuna With a Scallop Topper in a Delicate Broth cat complement. The real, recognizable ingredients look good enough for you to eat, but this tempting complement is specially created for your adult cat's discerning taste buds. Let her savor the tender, flaked tuna texture in every bite, and watch as she enjoys the delicate broth. Intended as a complement to her complete and balanced diet, this seafood appetizer indulges your cat's sophisticated palate. We package this enticing complement in a convenient peel-and-serve tray, so there's no cleanup to worry about. Offer this Purina Fancy Feast Appetizer when your cat wants a bit of added gourmet goodness, and show her just how much you care about giving her delectable flavor options between meals. Get quality and nutrition that deliver every time by ordering Purina Fancy Feast from Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: Ten (10) 1.1 Oz. Tray - Purina Fancy Feast Appetizers Light Meat Tuna With A Scallop Topper Adult Wet Cat Food Complement
Served In A Convenient Peel-And-Serve Tray
Tender, Flaked Texture To Tempt Your Cat
